verses.verse: And the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me came again <S%H7725><s%>, and waked <S%H5782><s%> me <S%H376><s%>, as a man that is wakened <S%H5782><s%> out of his sleep <S%H8142><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H7200><s%>, What seest thou <S%H559><s%>? And I said, I have seen <S%H7200><s%>, and <S%H4501><s%>, behold, a candlestick all of gold <S%H2091><s%>, with its bowl <S%H1531><s%> upon the top <S%H7218><s%> of it <S%H7651><s%>, and its seven lamps <S%H5216><s%> thereon <S%H7651><s%>; there are seven pipes <S%H4166><s%> to each of the <S%H7651><s%> lamps <S%H5216><s%>, which are upon the top thereof <S%H7218><s%>;

and two <S%H8147><s%> olive-trees <S%H2132><s%> by it <S%H259><s%>, one upon the right <S%H3225><s%> side of the bowl <S%H1543><s%>, and the other <S%H259><s%> upon the left side thereof <S%H8040><s%>.
And I answered <S%H6030><s%> and spake <S%H559><s%> to the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me <S%H559><s%>, saying, What are these <S%H113><s%>, my lord?

Then the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H3045><s%>, Knowest thou not what these are <S%H559><s%>? And I said, No <S%H113><s%>, my lord.

Then he answered <S%H6030><s%> and spake <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying, This is the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> unto Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Not by might <S%H2428><s%>, nor by power <S%H3581><s%>, but by my Spirit <S%H7307><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.

Who art thou <S%H1419><s%>, O great mountain <S%H2022><s%>? before <S%H6440><s%> Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> thou shalt become a plain <S%H4334><s%>; and he shall bring forth <S%H3318><s%> the top stone <S%H68><s%> with shoutings <S%H8663><s%> of Grace <S%H2580><s%>, grace <S%H2580><s%>, unto it.
Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

The hands <S%H3027><s%> of Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> have laid the foundation <S%H3245><s%> of this house <S%H1004><s%>; his hands <S%H3027><s%> shall also finish <S%H1214><s%> it <S%H3045><s%>; and thou shalt know that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> hath sent me unto you <S%H7971><s%>.

For who hath despised <S%H936><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> of small things <S%H6996><s%>? for these seven shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%>, and shall see <S%H7200><s%> the plummet <S%H68><s%> in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%>; these <S%H7651><s%> are the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, which run to and fro <S%H7751><s%> through the whole earth <S%H776><s%>.

Then answered <S%H6030><s%> I <S%H559><s%>, and said unto him <S%H8147><s%>, What are these two olive-trees <S%H2132><s%> upon the right <S%H3225><s%> side of the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> and upon the left side thereof <S%H8040><s%>?

And I answered <S%H6030><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> time <S%H559><s%>, and said unto him <S%H8147><s%>, What are these two olive <S%H2132><s%> - branches <S%H7641><s%>, which are beside <S%H3027><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> golden <S%H2091><s%> spouts <S%H6804><s%>, that empty <S%H7324><s%> the golden oil out of themselves <S%H2091><s%>?
And he answered <S%H559><s%> me and said <S%H559><s%>, Knowest <S%H3045><s%> thou not what these are <S%H559><s%>? And I said, No <S%H113><s%>, my lord.
Then said <S%H559><s%> he <S%H8147><s%>, These are the two anointed <S%H3323><s%> ones <S%H1121><s%>, that stand <S%H5975><s%> by the Lord <S%H113><s%> of the whole earth <S%H776><s%>.
